short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Converts simplified chinese characters to traditional characters

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Converts simplified chinese characters to traditional characters.

As one simplified character can have multiple traditional equivalences, sometimes the conversion will produce the incorrect traditional character. (For more information, read: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ambiguities_in_Chinese_character_simplification)
